content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Haoyu Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Hello Haoyu Wang, glad to meet you. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: The apartment is located in the city center, which means higher costs. I have to pay mortgage, property taxes, and other costs. Therefore, I have to rent it for at least 800 Euro.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: That's a steep price. I can offer you 600 Euro.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: As I said, the apartment is in the city center and I have additional costs. I cannot reduce the price below 700 Euro.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: 700 Euro sounds fair to me. I agree to the price of [700] Euro!
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
